SELECT TP.*, U.*, P.*, PF.*, S.* FROM `Partner` AS P JOIN `User` AS U ON P.user_id = U.user_id JOIN `Performance` AS PF ON P.partner_id = PF.partner_id JOIN `TicketPrice` AS TP ON PF.performance_id = TP.performance_id JOIN `Settlement` AS S ON P.partner_id = S.partner_id WHERE U.user_id = #{user_id}
